title: Ekko
body: so i got on today totally happy to buy the new champ Ekko, but when i got to the shop and paid for him it charged me 2 times for the single champion what can i do here?

replies.body:
Hey TacoKitty,

Did you re-log your client to ensure it wasn't a visual bug with your IP/RP?

If so, and you were definitely charged twice, you can submit a [ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=4584) to Player Support, and they'll be able to adjust your account so you were only charged once.

Hey Katey, I have a question, is Riot at all investigating Ekko?  I'm not having any fun playing League since yesterday on his release, I can't play any champion that isn't tanky or else I just instantly die.

> [{quoted}](name=Fanryu,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=5QbiYERG,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-05-29T15:38:05.324+0000)

> Hey Katey, I have a question, is Riot at all investigating Ekko?  I'm not having any fun playing League since yesterday on his release, I can't play any champion that isn't tanky or else I just instantly die.

The Champion team always keeps an eye on newly released champions on live. 

I'm on the skins team, so I'm not sure if/what they have planned, but what are you finding most difficult to deal with when it comes to Ekko? I'd be happy to pass your feedback along. ^-^

i the game i played against Ekko last night, the one thing i found most frustrating is his crazy good AP scaling on his shield. The enemy Ekko got fed, built AP, and suddenly had a 1000-point shield available. Everything else in his kit is counterable by more experience playing against him, i think, but i feel like that shield could use a nerf

It just seems like no matter what champion I play, he can stick to me like glue, and can outburst ANYONE I play, which as I recall they said that he was a champion who lacked the raw power to burst champions down.
You have a issue and wants Riot to *Using such a big word*, investigate him, because you suck at non-tanky champions yet you had weeks to know Ekko is a mage assassin?
Sorry, your bait isn't working, please try again later.
You're dodging me on purpose. You're not admitting your mistake. You specifcally said you're bad with non-tanky champions, when you had a month to know that Ekko is a assassin.
I'm not dodging anything, you're attempting to bait me by calling me bad and I'm choosing not to entertain you.  If you had a valid argument, you wouldn't be a dick in conveying it.

If you're going to be salty because you said you instantly die with non-tanks and you  can't take me as referring to "bad", good luck in ranked, you won't get anywhere because you refuse to take feedback.
"You're bad" is not feedback, that's just insulting.  So GG no Re.  Also, please, don't tell people how to get better at League when you're Bronze 5.
Whose the guy trying to start a ACTUAL flame war by using the classic bronze excuse? You're pathetic.
Cool.  You're still bronze and telling people to get good.  I'm not starting a flame war, I'm stopping your entire argument before it truly begins.  So cool story.
You're still acting the victim when my entire thing was to point out that Ekko wasn't a tank champion.
With how broken his kit is, there are basically 2 champs in there. Working as intended.

he will be nerfed in the next patch as usual. It is like people forget there was ever a new champ.

They are more often than not released super strong so people will buy them, then nerfed down significantly.
